description: The answer to the ever evolving challange of the cataclysm, survivor gear is customized for utility and versility. This particular gear set is a long sleeve shirt with plenty of pockets. A nomex underlay protects from the enviroment while kevlar gives a bit of physical protection.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
